sentences.en: According to local folklore it is an evil place.
sentences.cn: 据当地民间传说，那是个不祥的地方。

sentences.en: According to Mandy, Pat's tough exterior hides a shy and sensitive soul.
sentences.cn: 据曼迪说，帕特彪悍的外表下隐藏着一颗害羞且敏感的心。

sentences.en: According to my watch it is 4 o'clock.
According to one official more than a hundred people have been arrested.
sentences.cn: 一名官员称有一百多人被捕。

sentences.en: According to protocol, he first reported to the Director of the hospital.
sentences.cn: 根据礼节，他先向医院院长报到。

sentences.en: According to the best available information, the facts are these.
sentences.cn: 根据最可靠的消息，事实如下。

sentences.en: According to the prosecution, the officers manufactured an elaborate story.
sentences.cn: 根据控方意见，官员们精心编造了事情经过。

sentences.en: According to the survey, overall world trade has also slackened.
sentences.cn: 根据这项调查，世界贸易整体上也有所放慢。

sentences.en: He advocates streaming children, and educating them according to their needs.
sentences.cn: 他提倡把学生按能力分班，因需施教。

sentences.en: He was, according to witnesses, extremely wintry with Her Royal Highness.
sentences.cn: 据目击者称，他对女王殿下极其冷淡。

sentences.en: His predecessor was accorded an equally tumultuous welcome.
sentences.cn: 他的前任受到了同样热烈的欢迎。

sentences.en: I tailor-make music according to the person.
sentences.cn: 我因人而异地谱写音乐。

sentences.en: On his return home, the government accorded him the rank of Colonel.
sentences.cn: 在他回国时，该国政府授予他上校军衔。

sentences.en: Philip stayed at the hotel, according to Mr Hemming.
sentences.cn: 据亨明先生所说，菲利普住在旅馆里。

sentences.en: Prices change according to supply and demand.
sentences.cn: 价格受供求关系的影响。

sentences.en: Prices vary according to the quantity ordered.
sentences.cn: 价格随订购数量不同而有所变化。

sentences.en: Pubs are dirty, smelly and unfriendly, according to the Good Pub Guide.
sentences.cn: 据《好酒吧指南》所说，酒吧一般环境肮脏，气味难闻，而且气氛很不友好。

sentences.en: The exhibits were arranged according to schools.
sentences.cn: 展品是依照流派陈列的。

sentences.en: They both played the game according to the rules.

trans.tran_cn: 相等的， 一致的， 依…而定的
给予（某种待遇），（与…）一致，符合
trans.tran_en: If you are accorded a particular kind of treatment, people act toward you or treat you in that way
